title: Heera Kundan Haaram with Emerald Centrepiece
materials: Rubies. Exhibits exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Intricately designed haaram featuring traditional Kundan craftsmanship, set with uncut Polki diamonds. The pendant showcases a central, eye-catching Emerald and delicate Ruby accents, flanked by Peacock motifs. Gold droplet hangings at the base add movement and grace. The neck chain is designed with floral pendants studded with diamonds.
occasions: and other grand occasions. Ideal for brides and those seeking a statement piece of timeless elegance.
description: This Heera Kundan Haaram represents the pinnacle of South Indian jewelry artistry. The combination of radiant Polki diamonds, vibrant emerald, and delicate rubies creates a captivating and luxurious look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. A true heirloom piece, embodying tradition and exquisite craftsmanship.
